title: Champion Mastery
body: I feel like champion mastery should be changed to where you get points based on how well you do as a player, not for winning the game. For example: i went 14-5-18 as Kindred jungle which should be a lot of champion mastery points as it is evidence of learning the champion and getting better with them but because we lost that game I get 219. Winning or losing games shouldn't be the decider as to how  if you get 200 points or 900. Having a champion mastered should show you have experience playing that champion and do well with them, not that you won with that champion a lot.

replies.body: The thing is, if you lost, clearly something went wrong. I doesn't matter if "someone else fed" there's always something you could have done to win that game.
You get a certain amount for winning, and a certain amount based on how you did on the champ compared to that champion's average playerbase.
If it was a single player game I might agree with you. Having your Mastery Score depend purely on your individual play in LoL would promote much more selfish behaviour in game though in my opinion.
